name: Spelunky Classic HD OUYA Edition
description:
Spelunky Classic HD as worked on by yancharkin source linked below. A couple changes were made to port to ouya:

Controller handling chages

Start button mapping

Changes to room rendering to ensure best performance

Ouya packaging

bug fixes

and a couple more tweaks are on the way

https://github.com/yancharkin/SpelunkyClassicHD
